meanings.definition: Covered in or consisting of hummocks.
meanings.sent1: The hummocky terrain made it difficult to walk smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The landscape was hummocky, with small hills scattered around.
meanings.sent3: The hummocky ground seemed to play hide and seek with the hikers.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a hummocky field of thoughts, each bump representing a different idea.
meanings.sent5: The hummocky texture of the blanket reminded her of a bumpy road.

meanings.sent1: The hummocky clouds in the sky looked like fluffy pillows.
meanings.sent2: Her voice had a hummocky quality, rising and falling like small hills.
meanings.sent3: The hummocky pattern on his shirt made him look like a walking landscape.
meanings.sent4: The hummocky rhythm of the music mimicked the rolling hills of the countryside.
meanings.sent5: The hummocky appearance of the cake made it seem like a delicious mountain range.
